jscoverage to Cobertura XML Plugin
Last Published: 2011-06-22  | Version: 1.1.0
jscoverage to Cobertura XML Plugin

jscoverage-cobertura:transform

Full name:

eu.numberfour.maven.plugins:jscoverage-cobertura-maven-plugin:1.1.0:transform

Description:

This goal will take jscoverage's JSON output and transform it into the XML as expected by Cobertura.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
inputFile String - File from where to read the input of the transformation.
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/coverage/jscoverage.json.
outputFile String - File into which to save the output of the transformation.
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/coverage/cobertura-coverage.xml.
sourcePath String - Path where the source files are being located (useful so the Jenkins Plugin can link directly to the file).
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/classes/.

Parameter Details

inputFile:

File from where to read the input of the transformation.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/coverage/jscoverage.json

outputFile:

File into which to save the output of the transformation.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/coverage/cobertura-coverage.xml

sourcePath:

Path where the source files are being located (useful so the Jenkins Plugin can link directly to the file).
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/classes/
